Deploying Jekyll to Github-Pages with usage of plugins

27 March 2013 jekyll plugins howto github

Was not that easy, as I thought in my last post, because Github-Pages (gh-pages) do not allow any custom plugins!. So I came up with the following strategy used by Octopress and well described from Aleksey:

  1. First create a scecond branch called e.g. source
  2. Make it default at github

Jekyll Jumpstart - switching back to static site generation

24 March 2013 howto application jekyll

Blogging like a hacker suited me allways best:

  • Starting at the end of the last century with a hand made sites,
  • later using some ruby/perl pre-processors webgen, WML,WPP,
  • than switching to python based Leonardo and
  • later to enki a leight weight rails blog engine.

I never touched the main stream systems like MoveableType or the successor WordPress, but used in various occasions Software as a Service (SaaS) like Blogger (long before it was aquired by google) and than Posterous, which just recently disappeard …

Steuererklaerung mit Ubuntu 10.4 (Lucid Lynx)

26 May 2010 ubuntu wine elster application

… mit “wine”:http://www.winehq.org/ läuft “ElsterFormular”:https://www.elster.de/elfo_home.php unter “Ubuntu 10.4. (Lucid Lynx)”:http://ubuntu.com tadellos. Nur der Aufruf einzelner Formulare ist quälend langsam, deshalb

  $ rm /usr/shrare/wine/fonts/vga.sys

Für das “ElsterOnline”:https://www.elsteronline.de/eportal/ Zertifikat wird dann noch die Java-Version von SUN im Firefox-Browser benötigt, die wegen des Kaufs durch Oracle im Partner-Repository zu finden ist: deb http://archive.canonical.com/ lucid partner

dann

bash $ sudo apt-get install sun-java-jre sun-java-plugin $ sudo dpkg -P openjdk-*
